name: React.js Basic
details: Learn the basics of React.js and build interactive user interfaces. Dive into React components, state management, and component lifecycle. Get hands-on experience with real-world projects.

name: Node.js Development
details: Create server-side applications with Node.js and Express. Explore RESTful API design, database integration, and authentication. Launch your own RESTful API project.

name: Python Data Science & Algoritham
details: Master data analysis and machine learning with Python. Learn data visualization, predictive modeling, and data manipulation. Apply data science in real-world scenarios.

name: JavaScript Web Development
details: Build dynamic websites with JavaScript. Includes modern frameworks like React. Explore JavaScript ES6, asynchronous programming,

name: SQL Database Maintaning
details: Manage and optimize SQL databases for efficient data storage. Learn SQL query optimization, indexing, and backup strategies. Ensure data integrity and security.

name: Ruby on Rails Mastery
details: Become a Rails expert and create web applications with Ruby. Dive into MVC architecture, routing, and database integration. Develop and deploy Rails apps.

name: PHP Web Development Crash course
details: Build dynamic websites with PHP. Includes database integration and security practices. Develop e-commerce solutions and interactive web applications.

name: App Development
details: Create mobile apps for iOS and Android platforms. Explore app design, user experience, and app store deployment. Build and publish your mobile app.

name: UI/UX Design
details: Learn design principles and create user-friendly interfaces. Dive into user research, wireframing, and prototyping. Design engaging and intuitive interfaces.

name: Cybersecurity Essentials
details: Protect systems and data from cyber threats with best practices. Explore network security, encryption, and ethical hacking. Secure your digital assets.

name: DevOps for Continuous Integration
details: Implement DevOps practices for seamless software development. Explore automation, containerization, and continuous integration. Streamline your development pipeline.

name: Data Analysis with R
details: Analyze and visualize data using the R programming language. Dive into data manipulation, statistical analysis, and data storytelling. Gain insights from your data.
